text: [Ej mu'minon] On ciro, ki Alloh taolo ʙa vasilai on ʙarxe az şumoro ʙar ʙarxe digar ʙartarī dodaast, orzu makuned [to ducori hasad naşaved]. Mardon az on ci ʙa dast ovardaand, [podoşu] ʙahrae dorand va zanon [niz] az on ci ʙa dast ovardaand, [açru] ʙahrae dorand va az ʙaxşişi Alloh taolo [cize] ʙixohed. Be tardid, Alloh taolo ʙa har cize donost
